    • addExp

      public void addExp(int amount)
      Adds experience points and checks for level up. Levels up when experience reaches threshold.

    • equipWeapon

      public void equipWeapon(Weapon weapon)
      Equips a new weapon and updates damage. Base damage is 10 plus the weapon's damage.
